moratuwa - egodauyana pradeshayedi polis ana nothaka dhawanaya kala motar rathaye siti pudgalayan kisiyam nithiwirodhi katayuththak sandaha yamin sita athi bawata polisiya saka pala kala.eeye (02) rathri 10.20ta pamana ema motar rathaya moratuwa sita panadura desata dhawanaya wemin thibu athara andiri nithiya ullanganaya karamin egodauyana - parana para marga badhakayedi polis ana nothaka eya dhawana kara thibenawa.ehidi ema polis niladharin ee sambandhayen moratuwa - egodauyana - modara aluthpalama asala disthrik mayim marga badhaka rajakariye yedi sitina niladharinta danum di athi athara, pasuwa owun da adala rathaya nawathwana lesata sangnya kala da ema polis ana nothaka motar rathaya idiriyata dhawanaya wuna.
